title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc

content.text: Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc is founded.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc completes its initial public offering (IPO) and starts trading on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the ticker symbol SLS.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc executes a 1-for-10 reverse stock split.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc announces a 1-for-10 reverse stock split.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc executes a reverse stock merger with Galena Biopharma, Inc. As a result, the ticker symbol changes to GALE.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc completes a 1-for-20 reverse stock split.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc announces a 1-for-30 reverse stock split.
Sellas Life Sciences Group Inc continues to trade on the NASDAQ stock exchange under the ticker symbol GALE.
